marketplaces.name: slopfiles

marketplaces.repo_description: a curation of questionably-useful coding agent plugins

files.README.md:
# slopfiles

questionably useful claude code plugins

## Installation

Add the marketplace:

```bash
claude plugin marketplace add dexhorthy/slopfiles
```

Install the plugin:

```bash
claude plugin install clean-coder
```

## Plugins

### clean-coder

Professional coding assistant principles inspired by Uncle Bob.

**Skills:**

- `/clean-coder` - Professional coding principles (invoked when user is frustrated)

plugins.name: clean-coder
plugins.description: Professional coding assistant principles inspired by Uncle Bob
